org.scubaguy.facelook
Class CellularAutomata

java.lang.Object
  org.scubaguy.facelook.core.CellularAutomata

public class CellularAutomata
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a Cellular Automata. Provided with a Rule and dimensions, it can execute the rule across a board.

Constructor Summary
CellularAutomata(EditableBoard board, Rule rule)
          Creates a new Cellular Automata from an existing board.
CellularAutomata(int[][] states, Rule rule)
          Creates a new Cellular automata with specified states
CellularAutomata(int width, int height, Rule rule)
          Creates a new Cellular automata with specified width and height.
 
Method Summary

          Gets the bottom board

          Gets the height of the automata
 EditableBoard getTop()
          Gets the top board
 int getWidth()
          Gets the width of the automata
 void tick()
          Run the simulation one frame.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

CellularAutomata

public CellularAutomata(int width,
                        int height,
                        Rule rule)
Creates a new Cellular automata with specified width and height. The created cells will be in the 0 state.

Parameters:
width - The width of the new board
height - The height of the board
rule - The Automata rule

CellularAutomata

public CellularAutomata(int[][] states,
                        Rule rule)
Creates a new Cellular automata with specified states

Parameters:
states - A array of beginning states
rule - The Automata rule

CellularAutomata

public CellularAutomata(EditableBoard board,
                        Rule rule)
Creates a new Cellular Automata from an existing board.

Parameters:
board - The board to use
rule - The rule
